Enhance your Twitch streaming experience with our live chat extension for Google Chrome. 

This extension allows you to easily analyze the top words used in Twitch live chat. Simply set the time frame you want to analyze, and the extension will display the chat's top 5 most used words. 

Perfect for streamers looking to improve their content, engage with their audience and conduct on-the-spot polls. Try it out now and see the power of real-time chat analysis at your fingertips.
